meanings.sent1: The overhanging branches provided shade on a sunny day.
meanings.sent2: The overhanging cliff looked majestic against the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The overhanging lampshade made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: Her overhanging presence in the meeting dominated the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The overhanging clouds darkened the sky before the storm.

meanings.sent1: The overhanging roof protected us from the rain.
meanings.sent2: The overhanging balcony overlooked the garden below.
meanings.sent3: The overhanging curtain blocked the sunlight from entering the room.
meanings.sent4: His overhanging responsibilities weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The overhanging tree branches created a natural canopy above us.

meanings.sent1: The overhanging chandelier sparkled in the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent2: The overhanging bridge swayed slightly in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The overhanging hammock gently rocked back and forth.
meanings.sent4: The overhanging vines added a touch of green to the room.
meanings.sent5: The overhanging banner fluttered in the breeze at the entrance.
